select project1.projname as projectName, ( select count(user.id) from user,project as project2 where project2.id=user.projid and CONCAT(#{yearmonthCur},"01") > user.jointime and project1.projname=project2.projname ) - ( select count(user.id) from user,project as project3 where project3.id=user.projid and user.ifexit=1 and user.exittime>=CONCAT(#{yearmonthPre},"01") and CONCAT(#{yearmonthCur},"01") > user.exittime and project1.projname=project3.projname ) as lastMonthSum,
( select count(user.id) from user,project as project4 where project4.id=user.projid and project1.projname=project4.projname and user.jointime>=CONCAT(#{yearmonthCur},"01") and CONCAT(#{yearmonthNext},"01") > user.jointime )as curMonthNew,
( select count(user.id) from user,project as project5 where project5.id=user.projid and CONCAT(#{yearmonthNext},"01") > user.jointime and user.ifexit=0 and project1.projname=project5.projname ) as curMonthSum,
( select count(user.id) from user,project as project6 where project6.id=user.projid and CONCAT(#{yearmonthNext},"01") > user.exittime and user.exittime>=CONCAT(#{yearmonthCur},"01") and user.ifexit=1 and project1.projname=project6.projname ) as curMonthQuit,
( select count(user.id) from usewater,project as project7,user where project7.id=user.projid and usewater.meterid=user.meterid and usewater.year=#{yearmonthCur}/100 and usewater.month=#{yearmonthCur}%100 and project1.projname=project7.projname ) as curMonthGet,
( select count(user.id) from usewater,project as project8,user where project8.id=user.projid and usewater.meterid=user.meterid and (usewater.year!=#{yearmonthCur}/100 OR usewater.month!=#{yearmonthCur}%100) and project1.projname=project8.projname ) as curMonthNotGet,
( select count(user.id) from usewater,project as project9,user where project9.id=user.projid and usewater.meterid=user.meterid and project1.projname=project9.projname and usewater.year=#{yearmonthCur}/100 and usewater.month=#{yearmonthCur}%100 and usewater.amount >=8 ) as up8, ( select count(user.id) from usewater,project as project9,user where project9.id=user.projid and usewater.meterid=user.meterid and project1.projname=project9.projname and usewater.year=#{yearmonthCur}/100 and usewater.month=#{yearmonthCur}%100 and 8 > usewater.amount ) as down8 from user,project as project1 GROUP BY project1.id
